Deities @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ayrzul]{Ayrzul}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Baphomet]{Baphomet}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Black Butterfly]{Black Butterfly}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Calistria]{Calistria}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Dhalavei]{Dhalavei}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Erecura]{Erecura}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Hastur]{Hastur}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ketephys]{Ketephys}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Mephistopheles]{Mephistopheles}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Ng]{Ng}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Norgorber]{Norgorber}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Pillars of Knowledge]{Pillars of Knowledge}, @Compendium[pf2e.deities.Sivanah]{Sivanah}

Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Forced Quiet]{Forced Quiet}; Advanced Domain Spell @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Safeguard Secret]{Safeguard Secret}

You protect secrets and keep them hidden.
name: Secrecy Domain
